2.desc: Obtained at Season 1 Limbus Pass Level 60

5.desc: Obtained by clearing Station 13 of Refraction Railway Line 1.

6.name: Refraction Railway Line 1 Decorated Banner
6.desc: Obtained by clearing Station 13 of Refraction Railway Line 1 under 120 Total Turns.

7.name: Refraction Railway Line 1 Embellished Banner
7.desc: Obtained by clearing Station 13 of Refraction Railway Line 1 under 120 Total Turns during the first two weeks of the event.

8.name: Hell’s Chicken
8.desc: Obtained from the Hell’s Chicken event.

9.name: To My Mother…
9.desc: Obtained from the Hell’s Chicken event.

11.name: Season 2 Completion Banner

13.name: Refraction Railway Line 2 Basic Banner
13.desc: Obtained by clearing Line 2 with 3 or more Cycle Counts

14.name: Refraction Railway Line 2 Decorated Banner
14.desc: Obtained by clearing Line 2 with 5 or more Cycle Counts

15.name: Refraction Railway Line 2 Embellished Banner
15.desc: Obtained by clearing Line 2 with 5 or more Cycle Counts and under 200 Total Turns

16.name: Special Refraction Railway Line 2 Basic Banner
16.desc: Obtained by clearing Line 2 with 3 or more Cycle Counts before Season 2: Reminiscence ends

17.name: Special Refraction Railway Line 2 Decorated Banner
17.desc: Obtained by clearing Line 2 with 5 or more Cycle Counts before Season 2: Reminiscence ends

18.name: Special Refraction Railway Line 2 Embellished Banner
18.desc: Obtained by clearing Line 2 with 5 or more Cycle Counts and 200 or less Total Turns before Season 2: Reminiscence ends

19.name: Special Refraction Railway Line 2 Distinguished Banner
19.desc: Obtained by clearing Line 2 with 5 or more Cycles and under 150 Total Turns before the end of Season 2: Reminiscence (Must be a record made after 2023.09.15 20:15(KST))
